name: Group Whitewater Rafting – 8 Mile
description: Family-friendly whitewater rafting adventure featuring Class I–II rapids on the Yellowstone River, including exciting sections and calm stretches for swimming, with scenic views along Yellowstone’s northern border.

name: Group Scenic Rafting
description: Relaxed scenic rafting trip on a mild stretch of the Yellowstone River, ideal for families and groups looking to enjoy wildlife viewing, optional paddling, and peaceful floating through the Yellowstone River Valley.

name: Erik’s Ranch Horseback Riding
locationDetail: Erik’s Ranch & Retreats, south of Livingston, Montana, in Paradise Valley
description: Two-hour guided horseback trail ride through Montana landscapes with views of open ranch land and the Absaroka Mountains. Beginner-friendly, relaxed pace, and led by experienced guides.

name: Yellowstone Park Tours
description: See geysers, hot springs, wildlife (bison, elk, bears), and iconic landmarks. Details and pricing TBD

name: Hiking & Nature Walks
description: Various trails for all skill levels - explore at your own pace

name: Paradise Scenic River Tours
locationDetail: Yellowstone River near Emigrant / Livingston, Montana
description: Guided scenic float tours on the Yellowstone River featuring mountain views, wildlife viewing, and a relaxed, non-whitewater experience.
cost: Approximately $80 per person (based on typical group pricing; actual rates vary by group size and season)

name: Chico Hot Springs Soak
locationDetail: Chico Hot Springs Resort & Day Spa, Paradise Valley, approximately 30 miles south of Livingston
description: Historic hot springs resort offering outdoor natural mineral pools with mountain views. Known for consistently hot water, well-maintained facilities, and a classic Montana atmosphere.
cost: Approximately $40–$50 per person for day-use soaking (varies by day and season)

name: Lake Butte Sunset Tour
description: Historic yellow bus tour to the summit of Lake Butte overlooking the north shore of Yellowstone Lake. Sunset views, scenic vistas, and opportunities for wildlife watching with driver-host narration as lighting and animal activity permit.
locationDetail: Summit of Lake Butte / north shore of Yellowstone Lake

name: Old West Cookout with Stagecoach Ride
description: Historic stagecoach ride along an old stagecoach road through the sage-covered meadows of Pleasant Valley, followed by the Old West Cookout. Guests ride in a historically accurate reproduction Tally-Ho stagecoach, experiencing how early park visitors once traveled. Includes a safety briefing prior to departure.
duration: Approximately 45-minute stagecoach ride plus 15-minute safety talk (cookout follows)
